00047 // Method name : CompleteHistograms()
00048 // Description : Complete dressing histograms
00049 void CompleteHistogram()
00050 {
00051    // Draw reg./alt. event selection borders in Invariant Mass plots
00052    float MASS_12C_k2G = MASS_12C*k2G;
00053 
00054    for (int i=0; i<N_SILICON_CHANNELS; i++) {
00055 
00056       float max = mass_nocut[i]->GetMaximum();
00057 
00058       DrawVertLine(mass_nocut[i], MASS_12C_k2G,                                                      max*1.05, 14, 2);
00059       DrawVertLine(mass_nocut[i], MASS_12C_k2G + feedback.RMS[i] * k2G * gAsymAnaInfo->MassSigma,    max*0.3,   4, 2);
00060       DrawVertLine(mass_nocut[i], MASS_12C_k2G - feedback.RMS[i] * k2G * gAsymAnaInfo->MassSigma,    max*0.3,   4, 2);
00061       DrawVertLine(mass_nocut[i], MASS_12C_k2G + feedback.RMS[i] * k2G * gAsymAnaInfo->MassSigma,    max*0.3,   4, 2);
00062       DrawVertLine(mass_nocut[i], MASS_12C_k2G - feedback.RMS[i] * k2G * gAsymAnaInfo->MassSigma,    max*0.3,   4, 2);
00063       DrawVertLine(mass_nocut[i], MASS_12C_k2G + feedback.RMS[i] * k2G * gAsymAnaInfo->MassSigmaAlt, max*0.3,   4, 1);
00064       DrawVertLine(mass_nocut[i], MASS_12C_k2G - feedback.RMS[i] * k2G * gAsymAnaInfo->MassSigmaAlt, max*0.3,   4, 1);
00065    }
00066 }

00075 TGraphErrors* AsymCalculator::CalcBunchAsymDet(TH2 &hDetVsBunchId_ss, TH2 &hDetVsBunchId, DetLRSet detSet, TGraphErrors *gr)
00076 {
00077    // Calculate detector luminosities by taking sum over R/L detectors and all
00078    // bunches
00079    int totalL = 1;
00080    int totalR = 1;
00081 
00082    DetLRSet::iterator iDetPair = detSet.begin();
00083 
00084    for ( ; iDetPair!=detSet.end(); ++iDetPair) {
00085       totalL += hDetVsBunchId.Integral(1, N_BUNCHES, iDetPair->first,  iDetPair->first);
00086       totalR += hDetVsBunchId.Integral(1, N_BUNCHES, iDetPair->second, iDetPair->second);
00087    }
00088 
00089    if (!gr)
00090       gr = new TGraphErrors();
00091 
00092    // Main bunch loop to calculate asymmetry bunch by bunch
00093    for (Int_t iBunch=1; iBunch<=hDetVsBunchId_ss.GetNbinsX(); iBunch++) {
00094 
00095       UInt_t countsL = 0;
00096       UInt_t countsR = 0;
00097 
00098       for (iDetPair=detSet.begin() ; iDetPair!=detSet.end(); ++iDetPair)
00099       {
00100          countsL += hDetVsBunchId_ss.GetBinContent(iBunch, iDetPair->first);
00101          countsR += hDetVsBunchId_ss.GetBinContent(iBunch, iDetPair->second);
00102       }
00103 
00104       ValErrPair bunchAsym = CalcAsym(countsL, countsR, totalL, totalR);
00105 
00106       // skip if nothing was calculated
00107       if (!bunchAsym.first && !bunchAsym.second) continue;
00108 
00109       Int_t nPoints = gr->GetN();
00110       gr->SetPoint(nPoints, iBunch, bunchAsym.first);
00111       gr->SetPointError(nPoints, 0, bunchAsym.second);
00112    }
00113 
00114    return gr;
00115 }

00119 TGraphErrors* AsymCalculator::CalcBunchAsymX90(TH2 &hDetVsBunchId_ss, TH2 &hDetVsBunchId, TGraphErrors *gr)
00120 {
00121    DetLRSet detSet;
00122 
00123    detSet.insert( DetLRPair(5, 2) );
00124 
00125    return CalcBunchAsymDet(hDetVsBunchId_ss, hDetVsBunchId, detSet, gr);
00126 }

00128 
00130 TGraphErrors* AsymCalculator::CalcBunchAsymX45(TH2 &hDetVsBunchId_ss, TH2 &hDetVsBunchId, TGraphErrors *gr)
00131 {
00132    DetLRSet detSet;
00133 
00134    detSet.insert( DetLRPair(6, 1) );
00135    detSet.insert( DetLRPair(4, 3) );
00136 
00137    CalcBunchAsymDet(hDetVsBunchId_ss, hDetVsBunchId, detSet, gr);
00138 
00139    TF2 *scale = new TF2("scale", "TMath::Sqrt(2)*y");//, 1, N_BUNCHES);
00140    gr->Apply(scale);
00141 
00142    return gr;
00143 }

00152    detSet.insert( DetLRPair(6, 4) );

00155 
00156    TF2 *scale = new TF2("scale", "TMath::Sqrt(2)*y");//, 1, N_BUNCHES);

00158 
00159    return gr;
00160 }

00162 
00167 ValErrMap AsymCalculator::CalcDetAsymSqrtFormula(TH1 &hUp, TH1 &hDown, DetLRSet detSet)
00168 {
00169    Double_t LU = 0, RU = 0, LD = 0, RD = 0;
00170 
00171    DetLRSet::iterator iDetPair = detSet.begin();
00172 
00173    for ( ; iDetPair!=detSet.end(); ++iDetPair) {
00174       LU += hUp.GetBinContent(iDetPair->first);
00175       RU += hUp.GetBinContent(iDetPair->second);
00176       LD += hDown.GetBinContent(iDetPair->first);
00177       RD += hDown.GetBinContent(iDetPair->second);
00178    }
00179 
00180    ValErrMap results;
00181 
00182    results["geom"] = CalcAsymSqrtFormula(RU, RD, LD, LU);
00183    results["lumi"] = CalcAsymSqrtFormula(RU, LU, RD, LD);
00184    results["phys"] = CalcAsymSqrtFormula(RU, LD, RD, LU);
00185 
00186    return results;
00187 }

00246 
00256 void AsymCalculator::CumulativeAsymmetry(long* nGood, long* nTotal, long* nBack)
00257 {
00258    asymStruct x90[N_BUNCHES];  // x90[119] is total
00259    asymStruct x45[N_BUNCHES];
00260    asymStruct y45[N_BUNCHES];
00261    asymStruct cr45[N_BUNCHES];
00262    asymStruct tx90[N_BUNCHES][6];
00263    asymStruct tx45[N_BUNCHES][6];
00264    asymStruct ty45[N_BUNCHES][6];
00265 
00266    float    RL90[N_BUNCHES], RL90E[N_BUNCHES];
00267    float    RL45[N_BUNCHES], RL45E[N_BUNCHES];
00268    float    BT45[N_BUNCHES], BT45E[N_BUNCHES];
00269    float    NL, NR;
00270    Double_t tmpasym, tmpasyme;
00271    float    RU[N_BUNCHES], RD[N_BUNCHES], LU[N_BUNCHES], LD[N_BUNCHES];
00272    int      gbid[N_BUNCHES];    // if 1:good and used 0: be discarded
00273    float    fspinpat[N_BUNCHES];
00274    //long     Nsi[6] = {0,0,0,0,0,0};
00275 
00276    // Right-Left asymmetry
00277    for (int bid=0; bid<N_BUNCHES; bid++) {
00278 
00279        ESpinState bunchSpin = gMeasInfo->GetBunchSpin(bid+1); 
00280 
00281        fspinpat[bid] = (float) bunchSpin;
00282 
00283        // R-L X90
00284        if (Ncounts[2-1][bid] + Ncounts[5-1][bid] != 0)
00285        {
00286           NR         = Ncounts[2-1][bid];
00287           NL         = Ncounts[5-1][bid];
00288           RL90[bid]  = (float) (NR - NL)/(NR + NL);
00289           RL90E[bid] = (float) 2*NL*NR*sqrt( (1./NR) + (1./NL) ) / (NL+NR) / (NL+NR);
00290 
00291        } else {
00292           RL90[bid]  = 0.;
00293           RL90E[bid] = 0.;
00294        }
00295 
00296        // R-L X45
00297        if (Ncounts[1-1][bid] + Ncounts[3-1][bid] +
00298            Ncounts[4-1][bid] + Ncounts[6-1][bid] != 0)
00299        {
00300           NR         = Ncounts[1-1][bid] + Ncounts[3-1][bid];
00301           NL         = Ncounts[4-1][bid] + Ncounts[6-1][bid];
00302           RL45[bid]  = (float) (NR-NL)/(NR+NL);
00303           RL45E[bid] = (float) 2*NL*NR*sqrt((1./NR)+(1./NL))/(NL+NR)/(NL+NR);
00304 
00305        } else {
00306           RL45[bid]  = 0.;
00307           RL45E[bid] = 0.;
00308        }
00309 
00310        // B-T Y45
00311        if (Ncounts[3-1][bid] + Ncounts[4-1][bid]+
00312            Ncounts[1-1][bid] + Ncounts[6-1][bid]!=0)
00313        {
00314           NR         = Ncounts[3-1][bid] + Ncounts[4-1][bid];
00315           NL         = Ncounts[1-1][bid] + Ncounts[6-1][bid];
00316           BT45[bid]  = (float) (NR-NL)/(NR+NL);
00317           BT45E[bid] = (float) 2*NL*NR*sqrt((1./NR)+(1./NL))/(NL+NR)/(NL+NR);
00318 
00319        } else {
00320           BT45[bid]  = 0.;
00321           BT45E[bid] = 0.;
00322        }
00323    }
00324 
00325    // *** GOOD/BAD BUNCH CRITERIA 1
00326    float gtmin, gtmax, btmin, btmax;
00327    gtmin = 0.0;
00328    gtmax = 1.0;
00329    btmin = 0.0;
00330    btmax = 1.00;
00331 
00332    for (int bid=0; bid<N_BUNCHES; bid++) {
00333 
00334       gbid[bid] = 1;
00335 
00336       // good/total event rate
00337       if (nTotal[bid] != 0) {
00338          if ( ((float) nGood[bid]/nTotal[bid]) < gtmin) {
00339             fprintf(stdout,"BID: %d discarded (GOOD/TOTAL) %f \n",
00340                     bid, (float) nGood[bid]/nTotal[bid]);
00341             gbid[bid] = 0;
00342          }
00343 
00344          if ( ((float) nGood[bid]/nTotal[bid]) > gtmax){
00345             fprintf(stdout,"BID: %d discarded (GOOD/TOTAL) %f \n",
00346                     bid, (float) nGood[bid]/nTotal[bid]);
00347             gbid[bid] = 0;
00348          }
00349       }
00350 
00351       // background / carbon event rate
00352       if (nGood[bid]!=0) {
00353 
00354          if (((float)nBack[bid]/nGood[bid]) < btmin){
00355             fprintf(stdout,"BID: %d discarded (BG/GOOD) %f \n",
00356                     bid,(float)nBack[bid]/nGood[bid]);
00357             gbid[bid] = 0;
00358          }
00359 
00360          if (((float)nBack[bid]/nGood[bid]) > btmax) {
00361             fprintf(stdout,"BID: %d discarded (BG/GOOD) %f \n",
00362                     bid,(float)nBack[bid]/nGood[bid]);
00363             gbid[bid] = 0;
00364          }
00365       }
00366    }
00367 
00368    float x90phys[2][N_BUNCHES], x90acpt[2][N_BUNCHES], x90lumi[2][N_BUNCHES];
00369    float x45phys[2][N_BUNCHES], x45acpt[2][N_BUNCHES], x45lumi[2][N_BUNCHES];
00370    float y45phys[2][N_BUNCHES], y45acpt[2][N_BUNCHES], y45lumi[2][N_BUNCHES];
00371    float c45phys[2][N_BUNCHES], c45acpt[2][N_BUNCHES], c45lumi[2][N_BUNCHES];
00372 
00373    // X90 (2-5) (C:1-4)
00374    for (int bid=0; bid<N_BUNCHES; bid++) {
00375 
00376       ESpinState bunchSpin = gMeasInfo->GetBunchSpin(bid+1); 
00377 
00378       RU[bid] = (bid == 0 ? 0 : RU[bid-1]) + Ncounts[2-1][bid] * (bunchSpin ==  1 ? 1 : 0);
00379       RD[bid] = (bid == 0 ? 0 : RD[bid-1]) + Ncounts[2-1][bid] * (bunchSpin == -1 ? 1 : 0);
00380       LU[bid] = (bid == 0 ? 0 : LU[bid-1]) + Ncounts[5-1][bid] * (bunchSpin ==  1 ? 1 : 0);
00381       LD[bid] = (bid == 0 ? 0 : LD[bid-1]) + Ncounts[5-1][bid] * (bunchSpin == -1 ? 1 : 0);
00382 
00383       sqass(RU[bid], LD[bid], RD[bid], LU[bid], tmpasym, tmpasyme);
00384 
00385       x90[bid].phys   = tmpasym;
00386       x90[bid].physE  = tmpasyme;
00387       x90phys[0][bid] = tmpasym;
00388       x90phys[1][bid] = tmpasyme;
00389 
00390       sqass(RU[bid], RD[bid], LD[bid], LU[bid], tmpasym, tmpasyme);
00391 
00392       x90[bid].acpt   = tmpasym;
00393       x90[bid].acptE  = tmpasyme;
00394       x90acpt[0][bid] = tmpasym;
00395       x90acpt[1][bid] = tmpasyme;
00396 
00397       sqass(RU[bid], LU[bid], RD[bid], LD[bid], tmpasym, tmpasyme);
00398 
00399       x90[bid].lumi   = tmpasym;
00400       x90[bid].lumiE  = tmpasyme;
00401       x90lumi[0][bid] = tmpasym;
00402       x90lumi[1][bid] = tmpasyme;
00403    }
00404 
00405    fprintf(stdout, "si2 up :%10.0f down :%10.0f\n", RU[119], RD[119]);
00406    fprintf(stdout, "si5 up :%10.0f down :%10.0f\n", LU[119], LD[119]);
00407 
00408    // X45 (13-46) (C:02-35)
00409    for (int bid=0; bid<N_BUNCHES; bid++) {
00410 
00411       ESpinState bunchSpin = gMeasInfo->GetBunchSpin(bid+1); 
00412 
00413       RU[bid] = (bid == 0 ? 0 : RU[bid-1]) + (Ncounts[1-1][bid] + Ncounts[3-1][bid]) * (bunchSpin ==  1 ? 1 : 0);
00414       RD[bid] = (bid == 0 ? 0 : RD[bid-1]) + (Ncounts[1-1][bid] + Ncounts[3-1][bid]) * (bunchSpin == -1 ? 1 : 0);
00415       LU[bid] = (bid == 0 ? 0 : LU[bid-1]) + (Ncounts[4-1][bid] + Ncounts[6-1][bid]) * (bunchSpin ==  1 ? 1 : 0);
00416       LD[bid] = (bid == 0 ? 0 : LD[bid-1]) + (Ncounts[4-1][bid] + Ncounts[6-1][bid]) * (bunchSpin == -1 ? 1 : 0);
00417 
00418       sqass(RU[bid], LD[bid], RD[bid], LU[bid], tmpasym, tmpasyme);
00419       
00420       x45[bid].phys   = tmpasym;
00421       x45[bid].physE  = tmpasyme;
00422       x45phys[0][bid] = tmpasym;
00423       x45phys[1][bid] = tmpasyme;
00424 
00425       sqass(RU[bid], RD[bid], LD[bid], LU[bid], tmpasym, tmpasyme);
00426 
00427       x45[bid].acpt   = tmpasym;
00428       x45[bid].acptE  = tmpasyme;
00429       x45acpt[0][bid] = tmpasym;
00430       x45acpt[1][bid] = tmpasyme;
00431 
00432       sqass(RU[bid], LU[bid], RD[bid], LD[bid], tmpasym, tmpasyme);
00433 
00434       x45[bid].lumi   = tmpasym;
00435       x45[bid].lumiE  = tmpasyme;
00436       x45lumi[0][bid] = tmpasym;
00437       x45lumi[1][bid] = tmpasyme;
00438    }
00439 
00440    fprintf(stdout, "si1,3 up :%10.0f down :%10.0f\n", RU[119], RD[119]);
00441    fprintf(stdout, "si4,6 up :%10.0f down :%10.0f\n", LU[119], LD[119]);
00442 
00443    // Y45 (34-16) (C:23-05)
00444    for (int bid=0; bid<N_BUNCHES; bid++) {
00445 
00446       ESpinState bunchSpin = gMeasInfo->GetBunchSpin(bid+1); 
00447 
00448       RU[bid] = ((bid==0)?0:RU[bid-1]) + (Ncounts[3-1][bid]+Ncounts[4-1][bid])*((bunchSpin==1)?1:0);
00449       RD[bid] = ((bid==0)?0:RD[bid-1]) + (Ncounts[3-1][bid]+Ncounts[4-1][bid])*((bunchSpin==-1)?1:0);
00450       LU[bid] = ((bid==0)?0:LU[bid-1]) + (Ncounts[1-1][bid]+Ncounts[6-1][bid])*((bunchSpin==1)?1:0);
00451       LD[bid] = ((bid==0)?0:LD[bid-1]) + (Ncounts[1-1][bid]+Ncounts[6-1][bid])*((bunchSpin==-1)?1:0);
00452 
00453       sqass(RU[bid], LD[bid], RD[bid], LU[bid], tmpasym, tmpasyme);
00454       y45[bid].phys = tmpasym; y45[bid].physE = tmpasyme;
00455       y45phys[0][bid] = tmpasym;
00456       y45phys[1][bid] = tmpasyme;
00457 
00458       sqass(RU[bid], RD[bid], LD[bid], LU[bid], tmpasym, tmpasyme);
00459       y45[bid].acpt = tmpasym; y45[bid].acptE = tmpasyme;
00460       y45acpt[0][bid] = tmpasym;
00461       y45acpt[1][bid] = tmpasyme;
00462 
00463       sqass(RU[bid], LU[bid], RD[bid], LD[bid], tmpasym, tmpasyme);
00464       y45[bid].lumi = tmpasym; y45[bid].lumiE = tmpasyme;
00465       y45lumi[0][bid] = tmpasym;
00466       y45lumi[1][bid] = tmpasyme;
00467    }
00468 
00469    // CR45 (14-36) (C:03-25)
00470    for (int bid=0; bid<N_BUNCHES; bid++) {
00471 
00472       ESpinState bunchSpin = gMeasInfo->GetBunchSpin(bid+1); 
00473 
00474       RU[bid] = ((bid==0)?0:RU[bid-1]) + (Ncounts[1-1][bid]+Ncounts[4-1][bid])*((bunchSpin==1)?1:0);
00475       RD[bid] = ((bid==0)?0:RD[bid-1]) + (Ncounts[1-1][bid]+Ncounts[4-1][bid])*((bunchSpin==-1)?1:0);
00476       LU[bid] = ((bid==0)?0:LU[bid-1]) + (Ncounts[3-1][bid]+Ncounts[6-1][bid])*((bunchSpin==1)?1:0);
00477       LD[bid] = ((bid==0)?0:LD[bid-1]) + (Ncounts[3-1][bid]+Ncounts[6-1][bid])*((bunchSpin==-1)?1:0);
00478 
00479       sqass(RU[bid], LD[bid], RD[bid], LU[bid], tmpasym, tmpasyme);
00480 
00481       cr45[bid].phys  = tmpasym;
00482       cr45[bid].physE = tmpasyme;
00483       c45phys[0][bid] = tmpasym;
00484       c45phys[1][bid] = tmpasyme;
00485 
00486       sqass(RU[bid], RD[bid], LD[bid], LU[bid], tmpasym, tmpasyme);
00487 
00488       cr45[bid].acpt  = tmpasym;
00489       cr45[bid].acptE = tmpasyme;
00490       c45acpt[0][bid] = tmpasym;
00491       c45acpt[1][bid] = tmpasyme;
00492 
00493       sqass(RU[bid], LU[bid], RD[bid], LD[bid], tmpasym, tmpasyme);
00494 
00495       cr45[bid].lumi  = tmpasym;
00496       cr45[bid].lumiE = tmpasyme;
00497       c45lumi[0][bid] = tmpasym;
00498       c45lumi[1][bid] = tmpasyme;
00499    }
00500 
00501    printf("*************** RESULT *******************\n");
00502    printf("        physics                luminosity             acceptance\n");
00503    printf("X90  :%10.6f+-%10.6f %10.6f+-%10.6f %10.6f+-%10.6f\n",
00504            x90[119].phys,  x90[119].physE,
00505            x90[119].lumi,  x90[119].lumiE,
00506            x90[119].acpt,  x90[119].acptE);
00507    printf("X45  :%10.6f+-%10.6f %10.6f+-%10.6f %10.6f+-%10.6f\n",
00508            x45[119].phys,  x45[119].physE,
00509            x45[119].lumi,  x45[119].lumiE,
00510            x45[119].acpt,  x45[119].acptE);
00511    printf("Y45  :%10.6f+-%10.6f %10.6f+-%10.6f %10.6f+-%10.6f\n",
00512            y45[119].phys,  y45[119].physE,
00513            y45[119].lumi,  y45[119].lumiE,
00514            y45[119].acpt,  y45[119].acptE);
00515    printf("CR45 :%10.6f+-%10.6f %10.6f+-%10.6f %10.6f+-%10.6f\n",
00516            cr45[119].phys, cr45[119].physE,
00517            cr45[119].lumi, cr45[119].lumiE,
00518            cr45[119].acpt, cr45[119].acptE);
00519    printf("*************** RESULT *******************\n");
00520 
00521 
00522    // Target Position Loop
00523    for (int i=0; i<=nTgtIndex; i++) {
00524 
00525       // X90 (2-5) (C:1-4)
00526       for (int bid=0; bid<N_BUNCHES; bid++) {
00527 
00528          ESpinState bunchSpin = gMeasInfo->GetBunchSpin(bid+1); 
00529 
00530          RU[bid] = ((bid==0)?0:RU[bid-1]) + NDcounts[2-1][bid][i]*((bunchSpin==1)?1:0);
00531          RD[bid] = ((bid==0)?0:RD[bid-1]) + NDcounts[2-1][bid][i]*((bunchSpin==-1)?1:0);
00532          LU[bid] = ((bid==0)?0:LU[bid-1]) + NDcounts[5-1][bid][i]*((bunchSpin==1)?1:0);
00533          LD[bid] = ((bid==0)?0:LD[bid-1]) + NDcounts[5-1][bid][i]*((bunchSpin==-1)?1:0);
00534 
00535          sqass(RU[bid], LD[bid], RD[bid], LU[bid], tmpasym, tmpasyme);
00536 
00537          x90[bid].phys   = tmpasym;
00538          x90[bid].physE  = tmpasyme;
00539          x90phys[0][bid] = tmpasym;
00540          x90phys[1][bid] = tmpasyme;
00541       }
00542 
00543       // X45 (13-46) (C:02-35)
00544       for (int bid=0; bid<N_BUNCHES; bid++) {
00545 
00546          ESpinState bunchSpin = gMeasInfo->GetBunchSpin(bid+1); 
00547 
00548          RU[bid] = ((bid==0)?0:RU[bid-1]) + (NDcounts[1-1][bid][i]+NDcounts[3-1][bid][i])*((bunchSpin==1)?1:0);
00549          RD[bid] = ((bid==0)?0:RD[bid-1]) + (NDcounts[1-1][bid][i]+NDcounts[3-1][bid][i])*((bunchSpin==-1)?1:0);
00550          LU[bid] = ((bid==0)?0:LU[bid-1]) + (NDcounts[4-1][bid][i]+NDcounts[6-1][bid][i])*((bunchSpin==1)?1:0);
00551          LD[bid] = ((bid==0)?0:LD[bid-1]) + (NDcounts[4-1][bid][i]+NDcounts[6-1][bid][i])*((bunchSpin==-1)?1:0);
00552 
00553          sqass(RU[bid], LD[bid], RD[bid], LU[bid], tmpasym, tmpasyme);
00554 
00555          x45[bid].phys   = tmpasym;
00556          x45[bid].physE  = tmpasyme;
00557          x45phys[0][bid] = tmpasym;
00558          x45phys[1][bid] = tmpasyme;
00559       }
00560    }
00561 
00562    // **** for different t range ****
00563    float txasym90[6][N_BUNCHES], txasym90E[6][N_BUNCHES];
00564    float txasym45[6][N_BUNCHES], txasym45E[6][N_BUNCHES];
00565    float tyasym45[6][N_BUNCHES], tyasym45E[6][N_BUNCHES];
00566    float tcasym45[6][N_BUNCHES], tcasym45E[6][N_BUNCHES];
00567 
00568    for (int tr=0; tr<NTBIN; tr++) {
00569 
00570       float SUM=0;
00571 
00572       // X90 (2 vs 5)
00573       for (int bid=0; bid<N_BUNCHES; bid++) {
00574 
00575          ESpinState bunchSpin = gMeasInfo->GetBunchSpin(bid+1); 
00576 
00577          RU[bid] = (bid == 0 ? 0 : RU[bid-1]) + NTcounts[2-1][bid][tr] * ( (bunchSpin == 1)  ? 1:0) * gbid[bid];
00578          RD[bid] = (bid == 0 ? 0 : RD[bid-1]) + NTcounts[2-1][bid][tr] * ( (bunchSpin == -1) ? 1:0) * gbid[bid];
00579          LU[bid] = (bid == 0 ? 0 : LU[bid-1]) + NTcounts[5-1][bid][tr] * ( (bunchSpin == 1)  ? 1:0) * gbid[bid];
00580          LD[bid] = (bid == 0 ? 0 : LD[bid-1]) + NTcounts[5-1][bid][tr] * ( (bunchSpin == -1) ? 1:0) * gbid[bid];
00581 
00582          sqass(RU[bid], LD[bid], RD[bid], LU[bid], tmpasym, tmpasyme);
00583 
00584          tx90[bid][tr].phys  = tmpasym;
00585          tx90[bid][tr].physE = tmpasyme;
00586          txasym90[tr][bid]   = tmpasym;
00587          txasym90E[tr][bid]  = tmpasyme;
00588 
00589          SUM += NTcounts[2-1][bid][tr];
00590       }
00591 
00592       // X45 (1+3 vs 4+6)
00593       for (int bid=0; bid<N_BUNCHES; bid++) {
00594 
00595          ESpinState bunchSpin = gMeasInfo->GetBunchSpin(bid+1); 
00596 
00597          RU[bid] = ((bid==0)?0:RU[bid-1]) + (NTcounts[1-1][bid][tr]+NTcounts[3-1][bid][tr]) *((bunchSpin==1)?1:0)*gbid[bid];
00598          RD[bid] = ((bid==0)?0:RD[bid-1]) + (NTcounts[1-1][bid][tr]+NTcounts[3-1][bid][tr]) *((bunchSpin==-1)?1:0)*gbid[bid];
00599          LU[bid] = ((bid==0)?0:LU[bid-1]) + (NTcounts[4-1][bid][tr]+NTcounts[6-1][bid][tr]) *((bunchSpin==1)?1:0)*gbid[bid];
00600          LD[bid] = ((bid==0)?0:LD[bid-1]) + (NTcounts[4-1][bid][tr]+NTcounts[6-1][bid][tr]) *((bunchSpin==-1)?1:0)*gbid[bid];
00601 
00602          sqass(RU[bid], LD[bid], RD[bid], LU[bid], tmpasym, tmpasyme);
00603 
00604          tx45[bid][tr].phys  = tmpasym;
00605          tx45[bid][tr].physE = tmpasyme;
00606          txasym45[tr][bid]   = tmpasym;
00607          txasym45E[tr][bid]  = tmpasyme;
00608       }
00609 
00610       // Y45 (3+4 vs 1+6)
00611       for (int bid=0; bid<N_BUNCHES; bid++) {
00612 
00613          ESpinState bunchSpin = gMeasInfo->GetBunchSpin(bid+1); 
00614 
00615          RU[bid] = ((bid==0)?0:RU[bid-1]) + (NTcounts[3-1][bid][tr]+NTcounts[4-1][bid][tr]) *((bunchSpin==1)?1:0)*gbid[bid];
00616          RD[bid] = ((bid==0)?0:RD[bid-1]) + (NTcounts[3-1][bid][tr]+NTcounts[4-1][bid][tr]) *((bunchSpin==-1)?1:0)*gbid[bid];
00617          LU[bid] = ((bid==0)?0:LU[bid-1]) + (NTcounts[1-1][bid][tr]+NTcounts[6-1][bid][tr]) *((bunchSpin==1)?1:0)*gbid[bid];
00618          LD[bid] = ((bid==0)?0:LD[bid-1]) + (NTcounts[1-1][bid][tr]+NTcounts[6-1][bid][tr]) *((bunchSpin==-1)?1:0)*gbid[bid];
00619 
00620          sqass(RU[bid], LD[bid], RD[bid], LU[bid], tmpasym, tmpasyme);
00621 
00622          ty45[bid][tr].phys  = tmpasym;
00623          ty45[bid][tr].physE = tmpasyme;
00624          tyasym45[tr][bid]   = tmpasym;
00625          tyasym45E[tr][bid]  = tmpasyme;
00626       }
00627 
00628       // CROSS 45 (1+4 vs 3+6)
00629       for (int bid=0; bid<N_BUNCHES; bid++) {
00630 
00631          ESpinState bunchSpin = gMeasInfo->GetBunchSpin(bid+1); 
00632 
00633          RU[bid] = ((bid==0)?0:RU[bid-1]) + (NTcounts[1-1][bid][tr]+NTcounts[4-1][bid][tr]) *((bunchSpin==1)?1:0)*gbid[bid];
00634          RD[bid] = ((bid==0)?0:RD[bid-1]) + (NTcounts[1-1][bid][tr]+NTcounts[4-1][bid][tr]) *((bunchSpin==-1)?1:0)*gbid[bid];
00635          LU[bid] = ((bid==0)?0:LU[bid-1]) + (NTcounts[3-1][bid][tr]+NTcounts[6-1][bid][tr]) *((bunchSpin==1)?1:0)*gbid[bid];
00636          LD[bid] = ((bid==0)?0:LD[bid-1]) + (NTcounts[3-1][bid][tr]+NTcounts[6-1][bid][tr]) *((bunchSpin==-1)?1:0)*gbid[bid];
00637 
00638          sqass(RU[bid], LD[bid], RD[bid], LU[bid], tmpasym, tmpasyme);
00639 
00640          tcasym45[tr][bid]  = tmpasym;
00641          tcasym45E[tr][bid] = tmpasyme;
00642       }
00643    }
00644 }
00645 
00646 
00647 // Description : Calculate Statistics
00648 void AsymCalculator::CalcStatistics()
00649 {
00650    // Integrate good carbon events in banana
00651    cntr.good_event = 0;
00652 
00653    int X_index = gMeasInfo->fRunId >= 6 ? nTgtIndex : gNDelimeters;
00654 
00655    for (int i=0; i<X_index; i++) cntr.good_event += cntr.good[i];
00656 
00657    // Run time duration
00658    gMeasInfo->fRunTime = gMeasInfo->fRunId == 5 ? gNDelimeters : cntr.revolution/RHIC_REVOLUTION_FREQ;
00659 
00660    // Calculate rates
00661    if (gMeasInfo->fRunTime) {
00662       gMeasInfo->GoodEventRate = float(cntr.good_event) / gMeasInfo->fRunTime / 1e6;
00663       gMeasInfo->EvntRate      = float(gMeasInfo->fNEventsTotal) / gMeasInfo->fRunTime / 1e6;
00664       gMeasInfo->ReadRate      = float(gMeasInfo->fNEventsProcessed) / gMeasInfo->fRunTime / 1e6;
00665    }
00666 
00667    // Misc
00668    if (gMeasInfo->fWallCurMonSum)     gAnaMeasResult->wcm_norm_event_rate = gMeasInfo->GoodEventRate/gMeasInfo->fWallCurMonSum*100;
00669    if (gAsymAnaInfo->reference_rate)  gAnaMeasResult->UniversalRate       = gAnaMeasResult->wcm_norm_event_rate/gAsymAnaInfo->reference_rate;
00670    if (gMeasInfo->fRunId == 5)        gAnaMeasResult->profile_error       = gAnaMeasResult->UniversalRate < 1 ? ProfileError(gAnaMeasResult->UniversalRate) : 0;
00671 }
00672

00674 // Description : print warnings
00675 void AsymCalculator::PrintWarning()
00676 {
00677    printf("-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n");
00678    printf("------------------------------  Error Detector Results ----------------------------------\n");
00679    printf("-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n");
00680    printf("===> Bunch distribution \n");
00681    printf(" # of Bunches requirement for check  : %6d\n",errdet.NBUNCH_REQUIREMENT);
00682    printf(" Good Bunch SpeLumi Sigma Allowance  : %6.1f\n",errdet.BUNCH_RATE_SIGMA_ALLOWANCE);
00683    printf(" Good Bunch Asymmetry Sigma Allowance: %6.1f\n",errdet.BUNCH_ASYM_SIGMA_ALLOWANCE);
00684    printf(" SpeLumi sigma/mean                  : %8.4f\n",bnchchk.rate.sigma_over_mean);
00685    printf(" Asymmmetry sigma x90, x45, y45      : %8.4f %8.4f %8.4f\n",
00686           bnchchk.asym[0].sigma, bnchchk.asym[1].sigma, bnchchk.asym[2].sigma);
00687    if (bnchchk.rate.max_dev) printf(" Max SpeLumi deviation from average  : %6.1f\n",bnchchk.rate.max_dev);
00688    printf(" Number of Problemeatic Bunches      : %6d \n",  gAnaMeasResult->anomaly.nbunch);
00689    printf(" Problemeatic Bunches Rate [%%]      : %6.1f\n", gAnaMeasResult->anomaly.bad_bunch_rate);
00690    printf(" Bunch error code                    :   "); binary_zero(gAnaMeasResult->anomaly.bunch_err_code,4); printf("\n");
00691    printf(" Problemeatic Bunch ID's             : ");
00692    for (int i=0; i<gAnaMeasResult->anomaly.nbunch; i++) printf("%d ", gAnaMeasResult->anomaly.bunch[i]) ;
00693    printf("\n");
00694    printf(" Unrecognized Problematic Bunches    : ");
00695    for (int i=0; i<gAnaMeasResult->unrecog.anomaly.nbunch; i++) printf("%d ", gAnaMeasResult->unrecog.anomaly.bunch[i]) ;
00696    printf("\n");
00697    printf("===> Invariant Mass / strip \n");
00698    printf(" Maximum Mass Deviation [GeV]        : %6.2f (%d)\n", strpchk.dev.max,  strpchk.dev.st+1);
00699    printf(" Maximum Mass fit chi-2              : %6.2f (%d)\n", strpchk.chi2.max, strpchk.chi2.st+1);
00700    printf(" Maximum #Events Deviation from Ave  : %6.2f (%d)\n", strpchk.evnt.max, strpchk.evnt.st+1);
00701    printf(" Maximum Mass-Energy Correlation     : %8.4f (%d)\n", strpchk.p1.max,   strpchk.p1.st+1);
00702    printf(" Weighted Mean InvMass Sigma         : %6.2f \n",     strpchk.width.average[0]);
00703    printf(" Good strip Mass-Energy Correlation  : %8.4f \n",     strpchk.p1.allowance);
00704    printf(" Good strip Mass Sigma Allowance[GeV]: %6.2f \n",     strpchk.width.allowance);
00705    printf(" Good strip Mass Pos. Allowance[GeV] : %6.2f \n",     strpchk.dev.allowance);
00706    printf(" Good strip Mass Fit chi2 Allowance  : %6.2f \n",     strpchk.chi2.allowance);
00707    printf(" Good strip #Events Allowance        : %6.2f \n",     strpchk.evnt.allowance);
00708    printf(" Strip error code                    : "); binary_zero(gAnaMeasResult->anomaly.strip_err_code,4);printf("\n");
00709    printf(" Number of Problematic Strips        : %6d \n", gAnaMeasResult->anomaly.nstrip);
00710    printf(" Problematic Strips                  : ");
00711    for (int i=0; i<gAnaMeasResult->anomaly.nstrip; i++) printf("%d ", gAnaMeasResult->anomaly.st[i]+1);
00712    printf("\n");
00713    printf(" Number of Unrecog. Problematic Strip: %6d \n", gAnaMeasResult->unrecog.anomaly.nstrip);
00714    printf(" Unrecognized Problematic Strips     : ");
00715    for (int i=0; i<gAnaMeasResult->unrecog.anomaly.nstrip; i++) printf("%d ", gAnaMeasResult->unrecog.anomaly.st[i]+1) ;
00716    printf("\n");
00717    printf("===> Detector \n");
00718    printf(" Slope of Energy Spectrum (sum 6 det): %6.1f %6.2f\n", gAnaMeasResult->energy_slope[0], gAnaMeasResult->energy_slope[1]);
00719    printf("-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n");
00720    printf("\n\n");
00721 }

00724 // Method name : PrintRunResults()
00725 //
00726 // Description : print analysis results and run infomation
00727 void AsymCalculator::PrintRunResults()
00728 {
00729    printf("-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n");
00730    printf("-----------------------------  Operation Messages  --------------------------------------\n");
00731    printf("-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n");
00732    printf("\n\n");
00733 
00734    printf("-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n");
00735    printf("-----------------------------   Analysis Results   --------------------------------------\n");
00736    printf("-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n");
00737    printf(" fRunTime                 [s]   = %10.1f\n", gMeasInfo->fRunTime);
00738    printf(" Total events in banana         = %10ld\n",  cntr.good_event);
00739    printf(" Good Carbon Max Rate  [MHz]    = %10.4f\n", gAnaMeasResult->max_rate);
00740    printf(" Good Carbon Rate      [MHz]    = %10.4f\n", gMeasInfo->GoodEventRate);
00741    printf(" Good Carbon Rate/WCM_sum       = %10.5f\n", gAnaMeasResult->wcm_norm_event_rate);
00742    printf(" Universal Rate                 = %10.5f\n", gAnaMeasResult->UniversalRate);
00743    printf(" Event Rate            [MHz]    = %10.4f\n", gMeasInfo->EvntRate);
00744    printf(" Read Rate             [MHz]    = %10.4f\n", gMeasInfo->ReadRate);
00745    printf(" Target                         = %c%c\n",   gMeasInfo->fTargetOrient, gMeasInfo->fTargetId);
00746 
00747    if (gMeasInfo->fRunId >=6 ) {
00748       printf(" Maximum Revolution #           = %10d\n",   gMeasInfo->MaxRevolution);
00749       printf(" Reconstructed Duration  [s]    = %10.1f\n", gMeasInfo->MaxRevolution/RHIC_REVOLUTION_FREQ);
00750       printf(" Target Motion Counter          = %10ld\n",  cntr.tgtMotion);
00751    }
00752 
00753    printf(" WCM Sum     [10^11 protons]    = %10.1f\n", gMeasInfo->fWallCurMonSum/100);
00754    printf(" WCM Average [10^9  protons]    = %10.1f\n", gMeasInfo->fWallCurMonAve);
00755    printf(" WCM Average w/in range         = %10.1f\n", average.average);
00756    printf(" Specific Luminosity            = %10.2f%10.2f%10.4f\n", gHstat.mean, gHstat.RMS, gHstat.RMSnorm);
00757    printf(" # of Filled Bunch              = %10d\n", gMeasInfo->GetNumFilledBunches());
00758    printf(" bunch w/in WCM range           = %10d\n", average.counter);
00759    printf(" process rate                   = %10.1f [%%]\n", (float)average.counter/(float)gMeasInfo->GetNumFilledBunches() * 100);
00760    printf(" Analyzing Power Average        = %10.4f \n",     gAnaMeasResult->A_N[1]);
00761    printf(" feedback average tshift        = %10.1f [ns]\n", gAnaMeasResult->TshiftAve);
00762    printf(" Average Polarization (phi=0)   = %10.4f%9.4f\n", gAnaMeasResult->P[0],                  gAnaMeasResult->P[1]);
00763    printf(" Polarization (sinphi)          = %10.4f%9.4f\n", gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[0].P[0],        gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[0].P[1]);
00764    printf(" Phase (sinphi)  [deg.]         = %10.4f%9.4f\n", gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[0].dPhi[0]*R2D, gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[0].dPhi[1]*R2D);
00765    printf(" chi2/d.o.f (sinphi fit)        = %10.4f\n",      gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[0].chi2);
00766    printf(" Polarization (bunch ave)       = %10.4f%9.4f\n", gBunchAsym.ave.Ax[0]/gAnaMeasResult->A_N[1], gBunchAsym.ave.Ax[1]/gAnaMeasResult->A_N[1]);
00767    printf(" Phase (bunch ave)              = %10.4f%9.4f\n", gBunchAsym.ave.phase[0]*R2D, gBunchAsym.ave.phase[1]*R2D);
00768    if (gMeasInfo->fRunId == 5)
00769    printf(" profile error (absolute)[%%]   = %10.4f\n",      gAnaMeasResult->profile_error * fabs(gAnaMeasResult->P[0]));
00770    printf("--- Alternative %3.1f sigma result & ratio to %3.1f sigma ---\n", gAsymAnaInfo->MassSigmaAlt, gAsymAnaInfo->MassSigma);
00771    printf(" Polarization (sinphi) alt      = %10.4f%9.4f\n", gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[1].P[0],        gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[1].P[1]);
00772    printf(" Ratio (alt/reg)                = %10.2f%9.2f\n", gAnaMeasResult->P_sigma_ratio[0],      gAnaMeasResult->P_sigma_ratio[1]);
00773    printf(" Ratio ((alt-reg)/reg)          = %10.3f%9.3f\n", gAnaMeasResult->P_sigma_ratio_norm[0], gAnaMeasResult->P_sigma_ratio_norm[1]);
00774    printf(" Polarization (PHENIX)          = %10.4f%9.4f\n", gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[2].P[0],        gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[2].P[1]);
00775    printf(" Polarization (STAR)            = %10.4f%9.4f\n", gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[3].P[0],        gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[3].P[1]);
00776    printf("-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n");
00777 
00778    for(Int_t i=0; i<nTgtIndex+1; i++)
00779    printf(" Polarization tgt pos %6.1f     = %10.4f %9.4f\n", tgt.all.x[(int) tgt.Time[i]], gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[100+i].P[0], gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[100+i].P[1]);
00780 
00781    printf("-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n");
00782 }

00784 
00786 void AsymCalculator::DrawPlotvsTar()
00787 {
00788    Double_t polvstar[nTgtIndex+1], epolvstar[nTgtIndex+1], posvstar[nTgtIndex+1];
00789 
00790    for(Int_t i=0;i<nTgtIndex+1;i++) {
00791       polvstar[i]  = gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[100+i].P[0];
00792       epolvstar[i] = gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[100+i].P[1];
00793       posvstar[i]  = tgt.all.x[(int)tgt.Time[i]];
00794    }
00795 
00796    TH2F *h_vstar = new TH2F("Pol_vs_tarpos","Polarization vs target position",100,posvstar[0]-1,posvstar[nTgtIndex]+1,100,0,1);
00797 
00798    TGraphErrors *gpolvstar = new TGraphErrors(nTgtIndex+1,posvstar,polvstar,0,epolvstar);
00799    h_vstar->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Target position");
00800    h_vstar->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Polarization");
00801    gpolvstar->SetMarkerStyle(20);
00802    gpolvstar->SetMarkerColor(kGreen+100);
00803 
00804    DrawHorizLine(h_vstar, posvstar[0]-1, posvstar[nTgtIndex]+1, gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[0].P[0],                              kRed, 1, 2);
00805    DrawHorizLine(h_vstar, posvstar[0]-1, posvstar[nTgtIndex]+1, gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[0].P[0] - gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[0].P[1], kRed, 1, 1);
00806    DrawHorizLine(h_vstar, posvstar[0]-1, posvstar[nTgtIndex]+1, gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[0].P[0] + gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[0].P[1], kRed, 1, 1);
00807 
00808    h_vstar->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(gpolvstar, "P");
00809 }
00810 
00811 
00812 // Description : Caluclate energy yield weighted analyzing power
00813 //             : Histogram 34000 is filled only once, which is controled by CallFlag
00814 // Input       : int HID
00815 // Return      : A_N
00816 Float_t AsymCalculator::WeightAnalyzingPower(int HID)
00817 {
00818    // analyzing power
00819    //
00820    // A_N values from L. Trueman (new for Run-04)
00821    //      t = e * 22.18 / 1000000.
00822    //      Emin = (0.0010-0.001/2.)*1e6/22.18 = 22.5
00823    //      Emax = (0.0255+0.001/2.)*1e6/22.18 = 1172.2
00824 
00825    float anth[25] = { // for 25 GeV
00826        0.0324757, 0.0401093, 0.0377283, 0.0339981, 0.0304917,
00827        0.0274323, 0.0247887, 0.0224906, 0.020473,  0.0186837,
00828        0.0170816, 0.0156351, 0.0143192, 0.0131145, 0.0120052,
00829        0.0109786, 0.0100245, 0.00913435, 0.00830108, 0.00751878,
00830        0.00678244, 0.00608782, 0.00543127, 0.00480969, 0.00422038};
00831 
00832    float anth100[25] = { // for 100 GeV
00833        0.0297964, 0.0372334, 0.0345393, 0.0306988, 0.0272192,
00834        0.0242531, 0.0217307, 0.0195634, 0.017677,  0.0160148,
00835        0.0145340, 0.0132021, 0.0119941, 0.0108907, 0.00987651,
00836        0.00893914, 0.00806877, 0.00725722, 0.00649782, 0.00578491,
00837        0.00511384, 0.00448062, 0.00388186, 0.00331461, 0.00277642};
00838 
00839    if (gMeasInfo->GetBeamEnergyReal() > 200)
00840    {
00841       // Scale up the flattop (250 GeV) polarization values by 15%: 1.176 = 1./ (1-0.15)
00842       //for (int i=0; i<25; i++) anth[i] = anth100[i] * 1.176; v1.2.0 and earlier
00843       //
00844       // A new correction introduced in v1.3.1 scales pC polarization down by
00845       // approx 18% (0.823 +/- 0.012) at 250 GeV
00846       //for (int i=0; i<25; i++) anth[i] = anth100[i] * 1.215;
00847       //
00848       // A new correction to the H-jet introduced in v1.3.14 scales pC polarization up by
00849       // approx 13% at 250 GeV
00850       //
00851       // Yet another correction in for v1.6.1 that is implemented in v1.6.2
00852 
00853       //Float_t a_n_scale_v1_3_14 = 1;
00854       //Float_t a_n_scale_v1_6_1  = 1;
00855 
00856       //switch (gMeasInfo->fPolId) {
00857       //case kB1U:
00858       //   a_n_scale_v1_3_14 = 0.8371;
00859       //   a_n_scale_v1_6_1  = 1./0.9519; // overall is: 0.8794
00860       //   break;
00861       //case kY1D:
00862       //   a_n_scale_v1_3_14 = 0.8773;
00863       //   a_n_scale_v1_6_1  = 1./0.9640; // overall is: 0.9101
00864       //   break;
00865       //case kB2D:
00866       //   a_n_scale_v1_3_14 = 0.7870;
00867       //   a_n_scale_v1_6_1  = 1./0.9852; // overall is: 0.7988
00868       //   break;
00869       //case kY2U:
00870       //   a_n_scale_v1_3_14 = 0.8481;
00871       //   a_n_scale_v1_6_1  = 1./0.9615; // overall is: 0.8821
00872       //   break;
00873       //}
00874 
00875       //for (int i=0; i<25; i++) anth[i] = anth100[i] * 1.215 * a_n_scale_v1_3_14 * a_n_scale_v1_6_1;
00876       for (int i=0; i<25; i++) anth[i] = anth100[i];
00877 
00878    } else if (gMeasInfo->GetBeamEnergyReal() > 50) {
00879 
00880       for (int i=0; i<25; i++) anth[i] = anth100[i];
00881 
00882    } else if (gMeasInfo->GetBeamEnergyReal() > 20) {
00883       // A new correction to the H-jet polarization is introduced in v1.5.0 scales pC polarization up
00884 
00885       //Float_t a_n_scale_v1_5_0 = 1;
00886 
00887       //switch (gMeasInfo->fPolId) {
00888       //case kB1U:
00889       //   //a_n_scale_v1_5_0 = 0.8525;
00890       //   a_n_scale_v1_5_0 = 1;
00891       //   break;
00892       //case kY1D:
00893       //   //a_n_scale_v1_5_0 = 0.9231;
00894       //   a_n_scale_v1_5_0 = 1;
00895       //   break;
00896       //case kB2D:
00897       //   //a_n_scale_v1_5_0 = 0.9016;
00898       //   a_n_scale_v1_5_0 = 1;
00899       //   break;
00900       //case kY2U:
00901       //   //a_n_scale_v1_5_0 = 0.8000;
00902       //   a_n_scale_v1_5_0 = 1;
00903       //   break;
00904       //}
00905 
00906       //for (int i=0; i<25; i++) anth[i] = anth[i] * a_n_scale_v1_5_0;
00907    }
00908 
00909    float Y[HENEBIN];
00910    float sum  = 0.;
00911    float suma = 0.;
00912 
00913    for (int i=0; i<HENEBIN; i++){
00914       sum  += Y[i];
00915       suma += Y[i] * anth[i];
00916    }
00917 
00918    float aveA_N = sum != 0 ? suma/sum : 0;
00919 
00920    TH1F* hKinEnergyA_o = (TH1F*) gAsymRoot->fHists->d["std"]->o["hKinEnergyA_o"];
00921 
00922    if (!hKinEnergyA_o) return 0;
00923 
00924    sum = suma = 0;
00925 
00926    for (int i=1; i<=hKinEnergyA_o->GetNbinsX(); i++) {
00927       double bcont  = hKinEnergyA_o->GetBinContent(i);
00928 
00929       sum  += bcont;
00930       suma += bcont * anth[i-1];
00931    }
00932 
00933    float aveA_N_2 = sum != 0 ? suma/sum : FLT_MIN;
00934 
00935    printf("Average analyzing power: %10.8f (old: %10.8f)\n", aveA_N_2, aveA_N);
00936 
00937    return aveA_N_2;
00938 }
00939 
00940 
00941 // Description : returns true if strip #j is in exclusion candidate
00942 // Input       : int i, int j
00943 // Return      : true/false
00944 Bool_t AsymCalculator::IsExclusionCandidate(int k, int j)
00945 {
00946    int i = (k >= 36) ? k-36 : k;
00947 
00948    if (j == i || j == 35-i || j == 36+i || j == 71-i )
00949       return kTRUE;
00950 
00951    return kFALSE;
00952 }
00953 
00954 
00955 // Description : calculates profile error for given universal rate x
00956 //             : For run5, zero for blue beam
00957 float ProfileError(float x)
00958 {
00959    return gMeasInfo->fPolBeam == 1 ? exp(-0.152*log(1/x)) : 0 ;
00960 }

00962 
00968 void AsymCalculator::SpecificLuminosity(long* nGood)
00969 {
00970    float SpeLumi_norm[N_BUNCHES], dSpeLumi_norm[N_BUNCHES];
00971 
00972    // initialization
00973    SpeLumi.max = SpeLumi.Cnts[0];
00974    SpeLumi.min = 9999999;
00975 
00976    for (int bid=0; bid<N_BUNCHES; bid++) {
00977 
00978       if (gMeasInfo->fWallCurMon.find(bid+1) != gMeasInfo->fWallCurMon.end() )
00979 
00980       SpeLumi.Cnts[bid] = gMeasInfo->fWallCurMon[bid+1] != 0 ? nGood[bid]/gMeasInfo->fWallCurMon[bid+1] : 0;
00981 
00982       SpeLumi.dCnts[bid] = sqrt(double(nGood[bid]));
00983 
00984       ((TH1*) gAsymRoot->fHists->d["run"]->o["specific_luminosity"])->Fill(bid+1, SpeLumi.Cnts[bid]);
00985 
00986       if ( !gMeasInfo->IsEmptyBunch(bid+1) ) {
00987          if (SpeLumi.max < SpeLumi.Cnts[bid]) SpeLumi.max = SpeLumi.Cnts[bid];
00988          if (SpeLumi.min > SpeLumi.Cnts[bid]) SpeLumi.min = SpeLumi.Cnts[bid];
00989       }
00990    }
00991 
00992    SpeLumi.ave = utils::WeightedMean((Double_t*) SpeLumi.Cnts, (Double_t*) SpeLumi.dCnts, N_BUNCHES);
00993 
00994    if (SpeLumi.ave) {
00995       for (int bid=0; bid<N_BUNCHES; bid++) {
00996          SpeLumi_norm[bid]  = SpeLumi.Cnts[bid] / SpeLumi.ave;
00997          dSpeLumi_norm[bid] = SpeLumi.dCnts[bid] / SpeLumi.ave;
00998       }
00999    }
01000 
01001    // Book and fill histograms
01002    char hcomment[256];
01003    sprintf(hcomment, "Specific Luminosity");
01004 }
01005 
01006 
01007 // Description : Find Time shift from 12C mass peak fit. Units are all in [GeV]
01008 //             : ouotputs are converted to [keV]
01009 // Input       : int Mode
01010 //             : int FeedBackLevel 1) no fit, just max and mean
01011 //             :                   2) gaussian fit
01012 // Return      : average tshift [ns] @ 500keV
01013 //
01014 float TshiftFinder(int Mode, int FeedBackLevel)
01015 {
01016    int   np = 3;
01017    float par[np], sigpar[np];
01018    float chi2;
01019    float mdev,adev;
01020    float ex[N_SILICON_CHANNELS];
01021    char  htitle[50];
01022    float min,max;
01023    float margin = 0.2;
01024 
01025    TGraphErrors *tg;
01026    TF1 *f1 = new TF1("f1", "gaus");
01027 
01028    for (int st=0; st<N_SILICON_CHANNELS; st++) {
01029 
01030       feedback.strip[st] = st + 1;
01031 
01032       chi2 = sigpar[1] = 0; ex[st]=0; feedback.err[st]=1; // initialization
01033 
01034       switch (FeedBackLevel) {
01035 
01036       case 1:     // Level 1 Histogram Maximum and Mean
01037          cerr << "TshiftFinder:: Case=1 is no longer avarilable" << endl;
01038          exit(-1);
01039          break;
01040 
01041       case 2:   // Level 2 Gaussian Fit
01042          // parameter initialization
01043          par[0] = Mode ? mass_feedback[st]->GetMaximum() : mass_yescut[st]->GetMaximum(); // amplitude
01044          par[1] = MASS_12C * k2G;       // mean [GeV]
01045          par[2] = gAsymAnaInfo->OneSigma * k2G; // sigma [GeV]
01046 
01047          if (par[0]) { // Gaussian Fit unless histogram isn't empty
01048             Mode ? mass_feedback[st]->Fit(f1, "Q") : mass_yescut[st]->Fit(f1, "Q");
01049 
01050             par[1]    = f1->GetParameter(1);
01051             par[2]    = f1->GetParameter(2);
01052             sigpar[1] = f1->GetParError(2);
01053             chi2      = f1->GetChisquare();
01054          } else {
01055             par[1] = MASS_12C*k2G + ASYM_DEFAULT;
01056             par[2] = ASYM_DEFAULT;
01057             feedback.err[st] = 0; // set weight 0
01058          }
01059 
01060          feedback.err[st]  = Mode ? sigpar[1] : sigpar[1] * chi2 * chi2;
01061          feedback.mdev[st] = par[1] - MASS_12C*k2G;
01062          feedback.RMS[st]  = par[2];
01063          feedback.chi2[st] = chi2;
01064 
01065          break;
01066       }
01067    }
01068 
01069    // ds
01070    //if (Mode) {
01071 
01072      FeedBack->cd();
01073 
01074      TGraphErrors *gre = new TGraphErrors(N_SILICON_CHANNELS, feedback.strip, feedback.mdev, ex, feedback.err);
01075      gre->SetMarkerSize(MSIZE);
01076      gre->SetMarkerStyle(20);
01077      gre->SetMarkerColor(4);
01078 
01079      GetMinMaxOption(errdet.MASS_POSITION_ALLOWANCE*1.2, N_SILICON_CHANNELS, feedback.mdev, margin, min, max);
01080 
01081      mdev_feedback = new TH2F("mdev_feedback", "Mass Deviation in FeedBack Mode", N_SILICON_CHANNELS, -0.5, N_SILICON_CHANNELS+0.5, 50, min, max);
01082 
01083      mdev_feedback->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(gre,"P");
01084      mdev_feedback->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Strip ID");
01085      mdev_feedback->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Mass Deviation [GeV]");
01086 
01087    //} else {
01088 
01089      ErrDet->cd();
01090 
01091      // Mass Position Deviation from M_12
01092      GetMinMaxOption(errdet.MASS_POSITION_ALLOWANCE*1.2, N_SILICON_CHANNELS, feedback.mdev, margin, min, max);
01093      sprintf(htitle,"Run%.3f:Invariant mass position deviation vs. strip", gMeasInfo->RUNID);
01094      mass_pos_dev_vs_strip =  new TH2F("mass_pos_dev_vs_strip",htitle,N_SILICON_CHANNELS+1,0,N_SILICON_CHANNELS+1,50, min, max);
01095      tg =  AsymmetryGraph(1, N_SILICON_CHANNELS, feedback.strip, feedback.mdev, ex, ex);
01096      tg->SetName("tg");
01097      mass_pos_dev_vs_strip -> GetListOfFunctions()-> Add(tg,"p");
01098      mass_pos_dev_vs_strip -> GetYaxis() -> SetTitle("Peak - M_12C [GeV]");
01099      mass_pos_dev_vs_strip -> GetXaxis() -> SetTitle("Strip Number");
01100 
01101      // RMS width mapping of 12C mass peak
01102      GetMinMax(N_SILICON_CHANNELS, feedback.RMS, margin, min, max);
01103      sprintf(htitle,"Run%.3f:Gaussian fit on Invariant mass sigma vs. strip", gMeasInfo->RUNID);
01104      mass_sigma_vs_strip =  new TH2F("mass_sigma_vs_strip",htitle,N_SILICON_CHANNELS+1,0,N_SILICON_CHANNELS+1,50, min, max);
01105      tg =  AsymmetryGraph(1, N_SILICON_CHANNELS, feedback.strip, feedback.RMS, ex, feedback.err);
01106      tg->SetName("tg");
01107      mass_sigma_vs_strip -> GetListOfFunctions()-> Add(tg,"p");
01108      mass_sigma_vs_strip -> GetYaxis() -> SetTitle("RMS Width of 12C Mass Peak[GeV]");
01109      mass_sigma_vs_strip -> GetXaxis() -> SetTitle("Strip Number");
01110 
01111      // Chi2 mapping of Gaussian fit on 12C mass peak
01112      sprintf(htitle,"Run%.3f:Gaussian fit on Invariant mass chi2 vs. strip",gMeasInfo->RUNID);
01113      GetMinMax(N_SILICON_CHANNELS, feedback.chi2, margin, min, max);
01114      mass_chi2_vs_strip =  new TH2F("mass_chi2_vs_strip", htitle, N_SILICON_CHANNELS+1, 0, N_SILICON_CHANNELS+1, 50, min, max);
01115      tg  =  AsymmetryGraph(1, N_SILICON_CHANNELS, feedback.strip, feedback.chi2, ex, ex);
01116      tg->SetName("tg");
01117      mass_chi2_vs_strip -> GetListOfFunctions()-> Add(tg, "p");
01118      mass_chi2_vs_strip -> SetTitle(";Strip Number;Chi2 of Gaussian Fit on 12C Mass Peak;");
01119 
01120      //ds XXX Call strip anomaly detector routine
01121      StripAnomalyDetector();
01122    //}
01123 
01124    mdev = utils::WeightedMean((Double_t*) feedback.mdev, (Double_t*) feedback.err, N_SILICON_CHANNELS);
01125    printf("Average Mass Deviation  = %10.2f [GeV/c]\n", mdev);
01126 
01127    adev = mdev * G2k * gRunConsts[0].M2T/sqrt(400.);
01128 
01129    printf("Tshift Average @ 400keV = %10.2f [ns]\n", adev);
01130 
01131    // Unit Conversion [GeV] -> [keV]
01132    for (int i=0; i<N_SILICON_CHANNELS; i++) {
01133      feedback.tedev[i] = feedback.mdev[i]*G2k* gRunConsts[i+1].M2T;
01134      feedback.RMS[i] *= G2k;
01135    }
01136 
01137    return adev;
01138 }
01139 
01140 
01141 // Description : Fill out bunch by bunch Asymmetry Histograms
01142 //             : asym_bunch_x90, asym_bunch_x45, asym_bunch_y45
01143 //             : These histograms are then applied Gaussian fit to check anomaly bunches
01144 // Input       : string mode, int sign, int N, float A[], float dA[], float bunch[]
01145 void FillAsymmetryHistgram(string mode, int sign, int N, float *A, float *dA)
01146 {
01147 
01148    for (int bid=0; bid<N_BUNCHES; bid++) // loop for bunch number
01149    {
01150       // flip the asymmetry sign for spin=-1 to be consistent with spin=+1
01151       float a = A[bid] * sign;
01152 
01153       if ( !gMeasInfo->IsEmptyBunch(bid+1) && dA[bid] ) { // process only active bunches
01154 
01155          //if (bunch[bid] != -1) {
01156             if (mode == "x90") asym_bunch_x90->Fill(a, 1/dA[bid]); //weighted by error
01157             if (mode == "x45") asym_bunch_x45->Fill(a, 1/dA[bid]);
01158             if (mode == "y45") asym_bunch_y45->Fill(a, 1/dA[bid]);
01159          //}
01160       }
01161    }
01162 }
01163 
01164 
01165 // Description : call CalcBunchAsymXXX to calculate asymmetries bunch by bunch and
01166 // Calculate bunch asymmetries and corresponding errors for x45, x90, y45
01167 //             : Fill out asym_vs_bunch_x90, x45, y45 histograms
01168 void AsymCalculator::CalcBunchAsym(DrawObjContainer *oc)
01169 {
01170    // Get hist with all bunches for normalization
01171    TH2* hDetVsBunchId = (TH2*) oc->o["hDetVsBunchId"];
01172 
01173    SpinStateSetIter iSS = gRunConfig.fSpinStates.begin();
01174    
01175    for ( ; iSS!=gRunConfig.fSpinStates.end(); ++iSS)
01176    {
01177       string sSS = gRunConfig.AsString(*iSS);
01178 
01179       TH2* hDetVsBunchId_ss = (TH2*) oc->o["hDetVsBunchId_" + sSS];
01180 
01181       string grName;
01182       TGraphErrors *gr;
01183 
01184       grName = "grAsymVsBunchId_X90_" + sSS;
01185       gr     = (TGraphErrors*) ((TH2*) oc->o["hAsymVsBunchId_X90"])->GetListOfFunctions()->FindObject(grName.c_str());
01186       CalcBunchAsymX90(*hDetVsBunchId_ss, *hDetVsBunchId, gr);
01187 
01188       grName = "grAsymVsBunchId_X45_" + sSS;
01189       gr     = (TGraphErrors*) ((TH2*) oc->o["hAsymVsBunchId_X45"])->GetListOfFunctions()->FindObject(grName.c_str());
01190       CalcBunchAsymX45(*hDetVsBunchId_ss, *hDetVsBunchId, gr);
01191 
01192       grName = "grAsymVsBunchId_Y45_" + sSS;
01193       gr     = (TGraphErrors*) ((TH2*) oc->o["hAsymVsBunchId_Y45"])->GetListOfFunctions()->FindObject(grName.c_str());
01194       CalcBunchAsymY45(*hDetVsBunchId_ss, *hDetVsBunchId, gr);
01195    }
01196 
01197    // XXX ds
01198    return;
01199 
01200    // Define TH2F histograms first
01201    //Asymmetry->cd();
01202 
01203    char  htitle[100];
01204    float min, max;
01205    float margin = 0.2;
01206    float prefix = 0.028;
01207 
01208    sprintf(htitle, "Run%.3f: Raw Asymmetry X90", gMeasInfo->RUNID);
01209    GetMinMaxOption(prefix, N_BUNCHES, gBunchAsym.Ax90[0], margin, min, max);
01210 
01211    //asym_vs_bunch_x90 = new TH2F("asym_vs_bunch_x90", htitle, N_BUNCHES, -0.5, N_BUNCHES-0.5, 100, min, max);
01212    asym_vs_bunch_x90->SetName("asym_vs_bunch_x90");
01213    asym_vs_bunch_x90->SetTitle(htitle);
01214    asym_vs_bunch_x90->SetBins(N_BUNCHES, -0.5, N_BUNCHES-0.5, 100, min, max);
01215    DrawHorizLine(asym_vs_bunch_x90, -0.5, N_BUNCHES-0.5, 0, 1, 1, 1);
01216 
01217    sprintf(htitle,"Run%.3f : Raw Asymmetry Y45", gMeasInfo->RUNID);
01218    GetMinMaxOption(prefix, N_BUNCHES, gBunchAsym.Ay45[0], margin, min, max);
01219 
01220    //asym_vs_bunch_y45 = new TH2F("asym_vs_bunch_y45", htitle, N_BUNCHES, -0.5, N_BUNCHES-0.5, 100, min, max);
01221    asym_vs_bunch_y45->SetName("asym_vs_bunch_y45");
01222    asym_vs_bunch_y45->SetTitle(htitle);
01223    asym_vs_bunch_y45->SetBins(N_BUNCHES, -0.5, N_BUNCHES-0.5, 100, min, max);
01224    asym_vs_bunch_y45->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Counts weighted by error");
01225    asym_vs_bunch_y45->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Raw Asymmetry");
01226 
01227    DrawHorizLine(asym_vs_bunch_y45, -0.5, N_BUNCHES-0.5, 0, 1, 1, 1);
01228 
01229    // fill bunch ID array [1 - N_BUNCHES], not [0 - N_BUNCHES-1]
01230    float bunch[N_BUNCHES], ex[N_BUNCHES];
01231 
01232    for (int bid=0; bid<N_BUNCHES; bid++) { ex[bid] = 0; bunch[bid] = bid; }
01233 
01234    // Superpose Positive/Negative Bunches arrays into TH2F histograms defined above
01235    TGraphErrors *asymgraph;
01236 
01237    for (int spin=1; spin>=-1; spin-=2 ) {
01238 
01239       // Selectively disable bunch ID by matching spin pattern
01240       for (int bid=0; bid<N_BUNCHES; bid++) {
01241          bunch[bid] = (gMeasInfo->GetBunchSpin(bid+1) == spin ? bid : -1);
01242          //bunch[bid] = (gSpinPattern[bid] == spin ? bid : -1);
01243       }
01244 
01245       // X90
01246       asymgraph = AsymmetryGraph(spin, N_BUNCHES, bunch, gBunchAsym.Ax90[0], ex, gBunchAsym.Ax90[1]);
01247       asymgraph->SetName("asymgraph");
01248       asym_vs_bunch_x90->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(asymgraph, "p");
01249       asym_vs_bunch_x90->GetXaxis()->SetTitle(";Bunch Number;Raw Asymmetry;");
01250 
01251       FillAsymmetryHistgram("x90", spin, gBunchAsym.Ax90[0], gBunchAsym.Ax90[1]);
01252 
01253       // X45
01254       asymgraph = AsymmetryGraph(spin, N_BUNCHES, bunch, gBunchAsym.Ax45[0], ex, gBunchAsym.Ax45[1]);
01255       asymgraph->SetName("asymgraph");
01256       asym_vs_bunch_x45->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(asymgraph, "p");
01257       asym_vs_bunch_x45->GetXaxis()->SetTitle(";Bunch Number;Raw Asymmetry;");
01258 
01259       FillAsymmetryHistgram("x45", spin, gBunchAsym.Ax45[0], gBunchAsym.Ax45[1]);
01260 
01261       // Y45
01262       asymgraph = AsymmetryGraph(spin, N_BUNCHES, bunch, gBunchAsym.Ay45[0], ex, gBunchAsym.Ay45[1]);
01263       asymgraph->SetName("asymgraph");
01264       asym_vs_bunch_y45->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(asymgraph, "p");
01265       asym_vs_bunch_y45->SetTitle(";Bunch Number;Raw Asymmetry;");
01266 
01267       FillAsymmetryHistgram("y45", spin, gBunchAsym.Ay45[0], gBunchAsym.Ay45[1]);
01268    }
01269 
01270    // bunch asymmetry averages
01271    calcBunchAsymmetryAverage();
01272 }
01273 
01274 
01276 void AsymCalculator::CalcBunchAsymSqrtFormula(DrawObjContainer *oc)
01277 {
01278    TH2* hDetVsBunchId_up   = (TH2*) oc->o["hDetVsBunchId_up"];
01279    TH2* hDetVsBunchId_down = (TH2*) oc->o["hDetVsBunchId_down"];
01280 
01281    // Combine all bunches by making a projection on the Y axis
01282    TH1D* hDetCounts_up   = hDetVsBunchId_up->ProjectionY();
01283    TH1D* hDetCounts_down = hDetVsBunchId_down->ProjectionY();
01284 
01285    gAnaMeasResult->fAsymX90  = CalcDetAsymX90SqrtFormula (*hDetCounts_up, *hDetCounts_down);
01286    gAnaMeasResult->fAsymX45  = CalcDetAsymX45SqrtFormula (*hDetCounts_up, *hDetCounts_down);
01287    //gAnaMeasResult->fAsymX45T = CalcDetAsymX45TSqrtFormula(*hDetCounts_up, *hDetCounts_down);
01288    gAnaMeasResult->fAsymX45T = CalcDetAsymSqrtFormula(*hDetCounts_up, *hDetCounts_down, X45TDets);
01289    gAnaMeasResult->fAsymX45B = CalcDetAsymX45BSqrtFormula(*hDetCounts_up, *hDetCounts_down);
01290    gAnaMeasResult->fAsymY45  = CalcDetAsymY45SqrtFormula (*hDetCounts_up, *hDetCounts_down);
01291 
01292 }

01326 
01328 void AsymCalculator::CalcDelimAsymSqrtFormula(DrawObjContainer *oc)
01329 {
01330    TH2* hDetVsDelim_up    = (TH2*) oc->o["hDetVsDelim_up"];
01331    TH2* hDetVsDelim_down  = (TH2*) oc->o["hDetVsDelim_down"];
01332    TH2* hAsymVsDelim4Det  = (TH2*) oc->o["hAsymVsDelim4Det"];
01333 
01334    for (int iDelim=1; iDelim<=hAsymVsDelim4Det->GetNbinsX(); iDelim++)
01335    {
01336       TH1I *hDetCounts_up   = (TH1I*) hDetVsDelim_up  ->ProjectionY("hDetCounts_up",   iDelim, iDelim);
01337       TH1I *hDetCounts_down = (TH1I*) hDetVsDelim_down->ProjectionY("hDetCounts_down", iDelim, iDelim);
01338 
01339       // Check if there are events in the histograms
01340       if (!hDetCounts_up->Integral() && !hDetCounts_down->Integral()) continue;
01341 
01342       ValErrMap asymX90 = CalcDetAsymX90SqrtFormula(*hDetCounts_up, *hDetCounts_down);
01343       ValErrMap asymX45 = CalcDetAsymX45SqrtFormula(*hDetCounts_up, *hDetCounts_down);
01344       //ValErrMap asymY45 = CalcDetAsymY45SqrtFormula(*hDetCounts_up, *hDetCounts_down);
01345 
01346       asymX45["phys"].first  = TMath::Sqrt(2)*asymX45["phys"].first;
01347       asymX45["phys"].second = TMath::Sqrt(2)*asymX45["phys"].second;
01348       //cout << "test: " << asymX90["phys"] << ", " << asymX45["phys"] << endl;
01349       ValErrPair asymPhys = utils::CalcWeightedAvrgErr(asymX90["phys"], asymX45["phys"]);
01350       //cout << asymPhys << endl;
01351 
01352       hAsymVsDelim4Det->SetBinContent(iDelim, asymPhys.first);
01353       hAsymVsDelim4Det->SetBinError(iDelim, asymPhys.second);
01354    }
01355 
01356 }

01358 
01364 void AsymCalculator::CalcOscillPhaseAsymSqrtFormula(TH2 &h2DetCounts_up, TH2 &h2DetCounts_down, TH1 &hAsym, DetLRSet detSet)
01365 {
01366    // Loop over all bins along the horizontal axis
01367    for (int iBin=1; iBin<=hAsym.GetNbinsX(); iBin++)
01368    {
01369       TH1I *hDetCounts_up   = (TH1I*) h2DetCounts_up.ProjectionY("hDetCounts_up", iBin, iBin);
01370       TH1I *hDetCounts_down = (TH1I*) h2DetCounts_down.ProjectionY("hDetCounts_down", iBin, iBin);
01371 
01372       // Proceed only if there are events in the histograms
01373       if (!hDetCounts_up->Integral() && !hDetCounts_down->Integral()) continue;
01374 
01375       ValErrMap asyms = CalcDetAsymSqrtFormula(*hDetCounts_up, *hDetCounts_down, detSet);
01376 
01377       // Add a point to different types of asymmetry graphs
01378       AsymTypeSetIter iAsymType = gRunConfig.fAsymTypes.begin();
01379       for (; iAsymType!=gRunConfig.fAsymTypes.end(); ++iAsymType)
01380       {
01381          string sAsymType = gRunConfig.AsString(*iAsymType);
01382 
01383          ValErrPair asymValErr = asyms[sAsymType];
01384 
01385          string shName = "gr" + string(hAsym.GetName()) + "_" + sAsymType;
01386          TGraphErrors* graphErrs = (TGraphErrors*) hAsym.GetListOfFunctions()->FindObject(shName.c_str());
01387 
01388          Double_t binCntr = hAsym.GetBinCenter(iBin);
01389          utils::AppendToGraph(graphErrs, binCntr, asymValErr.first, 0, asymValErr.second);
01390       }
01391    }
01392 }
01393 
01394 
01395 // Description : calculate Asymmetry
01396 // Input       : int a, int b, int totalA, int btot
01397 // Return      : float Asym, float dAsym
01398 //
01399 // Asym = (A - R * B) / (A + R * B), where R = totalA/totalB
01400 //
01401 ValErrPair AsymCalculator::CalcAsym(Double_t A, Double_t B, Double_t totalA, Double_t totalB)
01402 {
01403    Double_t R = 0;
01404 
01405    if (totalB) R = totalA/totalB;
01406 
01407    Double_t denom1  = A+R*B;
01408    Double_t denom2  = A+B;
01409    Double_t asym    = 0;
01410    Double_t asymErr = 0;
01411 
01412    if ( denom1 && denom2 ) {
01413       asym    = (A-R*B)/denom1;
01414       asymErr = sqrt(4*B*B*A + 4*A*A*B)/denom2/denom2;
01415    }
01416 
01417    ValErrPair result(asym, asymErr);
01418 
01419    return result;
01420 }
01421 
01422 
01424 ValErrPair AsymCalculator::CalcAsymSqrtFormula(Double_t A, Double_t B, Double_t C, Double_t D)
01425 {
01426    Double_t asym, asymErr;
01427    Double_t denom = sqrt(A*B) + sqrt(C*D);
01428 
01429    if ( denom ) {
01430       asym    = (sqrt(A*B) - sqrt(C*D))/denom;
01431       asymErr =  sqrt(A*B*(C+D) + C*D*(A+B))/denom/denom;
01432    } else {
01433       asym    =  0;
01434       asymErr = -1; // set to -1 to indicate invalid result
01435    }
01436 
01437    ValErrPair result(asym, asymErr);
01438 
01439    return result;
01440 }
01441 
01442 
01443 // square root formula
01444 // A-RightUp  B-LeftDown  C-RightDown  D-LeftUp
01445 // elastic Carbons are scattered off more in Right for Up
01446 void AsymCalculator::sqass(Double_t A, Double_t B, Double_t C, Double_t D, Double_t &asym, Double_t &asymErr)
01447 {
01448    ValErrPair result = AsymCalculator::CalcAsymSqrtFormula(A, B, C, D);
01449 
01450    asym    = result.first;
01451    asymErr = result.second;
01452 }
01453 
01454 
01455 // Description : calculate average left-right and top-bottom asymmetry from bunch by bunch asymmetris.
01456 //             : also calculate phase from LR and Top-Bottom asymmetry
01457 void calcBunchAsymmetryAverage()
01458 {
01459    // flip the sign of negative spin bunches
01460    for (int bid=0; bid<N_BUNCHES; bid++) {
01461 
01462       if (gMeasInfo->GetBunchSpin(bid+1) == -1) {
01463          gBunchAsym.Ax90[0][bid] *= -1;
01464          gBunchAsym.Ax45[0][bid] *= -1;
01465          gBunchAsym.Ay45[0][bid] *= -1;
01466       }
01467    }
01468 
01469    // Calculate weighgted beam for Ax90, Ax45, Ay45 combinations
01470    utils::CalcWeightedMean((Double_t*) gBunchAsym.Ax90[0], (Double_t*) gBunchAsym.Ax90[1], N_BUNCHES, (Double_t&) gBunchAsym.ave.Ax90[0], (Double_t&) gBunchAsym.ave.Ax90[1]);
01471    utils::CalcWeightedMean((Double_t*) gBunchAsym.Ax45[0], (Double_t*) gBunchAsym.Ax45[1], N_BUNCHES, (Double_t&) gBunchAsym.ave.Ax45[0], (Double_t&) gBunchAsym.ave.Ax45[1]);
01472    utils::CalcWeightedMean((Double_t*) gBunchAsym.Ay45[0], (Double_t*) gBunchAsym.Ay45[1], N_BUNCHES, (Double_t&) gBunchAsym.ave.Ay45[0], (Double_t&) gBunchAsym.ave.Ay45[1]);
01473 
01474    // Calculate Left-Right asymmetry using Ax90 and Ax45
01475    calcLRAsymmetry(gBunchAsym.ave.Ax90, gBunchAsym.ave.Ax45, gBunchAsym.ave.Ax[0], gBunchAsym.ave.Ax[1]);
01476 
01477    // Calculate Top-Bottom asymmetry using Ay45
01478    gBunchAsym.ave.Ay[0] = gBunchAsym.ave.Ay45[0] * M_SQRT2;
01479    gBunchAsym.ave.Ay[1] = gBunchAsym.ave.Ay45[1] * M_SQRT2;
01480 
01481    // Calculate phase (spin pointing vector w.r.t. vertical axis) from Ax and Ay
01482    if (gBunchAsym.ave.Ay[0]) {
01483       float r_xy = gBunchAsym.ave.Ax[0]/gBunchAsym.ave.Ay[0];
01484       gBunchAsym.ave.phase[0] = atan(r_xy) - M_PI_2;
01485    } else {
01486       gBunchAsym.ave.phase[0] = 0;
01487    }
01488 
01489    gBunchAsym.ave.phase[1] = utils::CalcDivisionError(gBunchAsym.ave.Ax[0], gBunchAsym.ave.Ay[0], gBunchAsym.ave.Ax[1], gBunchAsym.ave.Ay[1]);
01490    gBunchAsym.ave.phase[1] = atan(gBunchAsym.ave.phase[1]) ? fabs( atan(gBunchAsym.ave.phase[1]) - M_PI_2 ) : 0 ;
01491 
01492    // Calculate Polarization
01493    if (gAnaMeasResult->A_N[1]) {
01494       gAnaMeasResult->basym[0].P[0] = gBunchAsym.ave.Ax[0]/gAnaMeasResult->A_N[1];
01495       gAnaMeasResult->basym[0].P[1] = gBunchAsym.ave.Ax[1]/gAnaMeasResult->A_N[1];
01496    } else {
01497       gAnaMeasResult->basym[0].P[0] = 0;
01498       gAnaMeasResult->basym[0].P[1] = 0;
01499    };
01500 
01501    cout << "========== bunch asymmetry average ===========" << endl;
01502    cout << gBunchAsym.ave.Ax90[0] << " " << gBunchAsym.ave.Ax90[1] << " "
01503         << gBunchAsym.ave.Ax45[0] << " " << gBunchAsym.ave.Ax45[1] << " "
01504         << gBunchAsym.ave.Ay45[0] << " " << gBunchAsym.ave.Ay45[1] << " "  << endl;
01505    cout << gBunchAsym.ave.Ax[0]   << " " << gBunchAsym.ave.Ax[1]   << endl << endl;
01506 }
01507 
01508 
01509 // Description : Calculate Left-Right asymmetry from X90 and X45 asymmetry combination
01510 //             :
01511 // Input       : float X90[2], float X45[2]
01512 // Return      : LR asymmetry and error : float &A, float &dA
01513 void calcLRAsymmetry(float X90[2], float X45_tmp[2], float &A, float &dA)
01514 {
01515    float X45[2] = {0, 0};
01516 
01517    // give sqrt(2) weight to X45 asymmetry
01518    X45[0] = X45_tmp[0] * M_SQRT2;
01519    X45[1] = X45_tmp[1] * M_SQRT2;
01520 
01521    // if horizontal target or X90 is zero, then return X45*sqrt(2) as LR asymmetry
01522    if (tgt.VHtarget) {
01523        A = X45[0];
01524       dA = X45[1];
01525       return;
01526    }
01527 
01528    // define error squares
01529    float dX45 = X45[1]*X45[1];
01530    float dX90 = X90[1]*X90[1];
01531 
01532    // calculate weighted mean of X90 and X45 asymetries
01533    if (dX90 + dX45 != 0 ) {
01534        A = (X90[0] * dX45 + X45[0] * dX90) / (dX90 + dX45);
01535       dA = (X90[1] * X45[1]) / sqrt(dX90 + dX45);
01536    } else {
01537       printf("WARNING: Denominator is zero in calcLRAsymmetry(). Assign zero LR asymmetry\n");
01538       A = dA = 0;
01539    }
01540 }
01541 
01542 
01547 // Description : call calcStripAsymmetry() subroutines for
01548 //             : regular and alternative sigma banana cuts, respectively.
01549 //             : Also call for PHENIX and STAR colliding bunches asymmetries
01550 void AsymCalculator::CalcStripAsymmetry(DrawObjContainer *oc)
01551 {
01552    // This is the old approach
01553    // regular sigma cut
01554    CalcStripAsymmetry(0);
01555 
01556    // Some consistency checks for different sigma cuts
01557    if (gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[0].P[0])
01558    {
01559       float diff[2];
01560 
01561       // calculate differences and ratio
01562       diff[0] = gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[1].P[0] - gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[0].P[0];
01563 
01564       gAnaMeasResult->P_sigma_ratio[0]      = gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[1].P[0] / gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[0].P[0];
01565       gAnaMeasResult->P_sigma_ratio_norm[0] = diff[0] / gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[0].P[0];
01566 
01567       // calculate errors for above, respectively
01568       diff[1] = utils::QuadErrorSum(gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[1].P[1], gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[0].P[1]);
01569 
01570       gAnaMeasResult->P_sigma_ratio[1] =
01571          utils::QuadErrorDiv(gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[1].P[0], gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[0].P[0], gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[1].P[1], gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[0].P[1]);
01572 
01573       gAnaMeasResult->P_sigma_ratio_norm[1] =
01574          utils::QuadErrorDiv(diff[0], gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[0].P[0], diff[1], gAnaMeasResult->sinphi[0].P[1]);
01575    }
01576 
01577    // This is the new approach
01578    TH1I* hUp     = (TH1I*) oc->o["hChannelCounts_up"];
01579    TH1I* hDown   = (TH1I*) oc->o["hChannelCounts_down"];
01580    TH1D* hChAsym = (TH1D*) oc->o["hChannelAsym"];        // This is where the result will go
01581 
01582    // Create hChAsym with asymmetries by channel
01583    CalcChannelAsym(*hUp, *hDown, hChAsym);
01584 
01585    // Set graph values from the histogram
01586    TH1*          hAsymVsPhi  = (TH1*) oc->o["hAsymVsPhi"];
01587    TGraphErrors* grAsymVsPhi = (TGraphErrors*) hAsymVsPhi->GetListOfFunctions()->FindObject("grAsymVsPhi");
01588 
01589    // Create and then fit to sine graph grAsymVsPhi given histogram hChAsym
01590    TFitResultPtr fitres = FitChAsymSine(*hChAsym, grAsymVsPhi);
01591 
01592    if (fitres.Get()) {
01593       gAnaMeasResult->fFitResAsymPhi = fitres;
01594    } else {
01595       Error("CalcStripAsymmetry", "Asym vs phi fit error...");
01596    }
01597 
01598    // Create polarization graph grPolarVsPhi directly from the asymmetry one grAsymVsPhi
01599    TH1*          hPolarVsPhi  = (TH1*) oc->o["hPolarVsPhi"];
01600    TGraphErrors* grPolarVsPhi = (TGraphErrors*) hPolarVsPhi->GetListOfFunctions()->FindObject("grPolarVsPhi");
01601 
01602    TGraphErrors* newGraph = (TGraphErrors*) grAsymVsPhi->Clone();
01603    newGraph->GetListOfFunctions()->Delete();
01604 
01605    grPolarVsPhi->TAttMarker::Copy(*newGraph);
01606    grPolarVsPhi->TAttFill::Copy(*newGraph);
01607    grPolarVsPhi->TAttLine::Copy(*newGraph);
01608    grPolarVsPhi->TNamed::Copy(*newGraph);
01609 
01610    hPolarVsPhi->GetListOfFunctions()->Remove(grPolarVsPhi);
01611    hPolarVsPhi->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(newGraph, "p");
01612 
01613    grPolarVsPhi = (TGraphErrors*) hPolarVsPhi->GetListOfFunctions()->FindObject("grPolarVsPhi");
01614 
01615    TF2 *asymToPolar = new TF2("asymToPolar", "1.*y/[0]");
01616    asymToPolar->SetParameter(0, gAnaMeasResult->A_N[1]);
01617    grPolarVsPhi->Apply(asymToPolar);
01618    delete asymToPolar;
01619 
01620 
01621    TF1 *fitFunc = new TF1("sin_phi", "[0]*TMath::Sin([1]-x)", 0, 2*M_PI);
01622 
01623    fitFunc->SetParNames("Polarization", "#phi");
01624    fitFunc->SetParameter(0, 0);
01625    fitFunc->SetParameter(1, 0);
01626    fitFunc->SetParLimits(0, 0, 1);
01627    fitFunc->SetParLimits(1, -M_PI, M_PI);
01628 
01629    fitres = grPolarVsPhi->Fit(fitFunc, "S R");
01630 
01631    if (fitres.Get()) {
01632       gAnaMeasResult->fFitResPolarPhi = fitres;
01633       // XXX add here an assignment of values to gAnaMeasResult->fPolar
01634    } else {
01635       Error("CalcStripAsymmetry", "Polar vs phi fit error...");
01636    }
01637 
01638    // Multiply by 100% for aesthetic reasons
01639    TF2 *dummyScale = new TF2("dummyScale", "100.*y");
01640    grPolarVsPhi->Apply(dummyScale);
01641    // Just re-fit the scaled graph
01642    fitFunc->SetParLimits(0, 0, 100);
01643    grPolarVsPhi->Fit(fitFunc, "R");
01644    delete dummyScale;
01645 }
01646 
01647 
01649 void AsymCalculator::CalcStripAsymmetryByProfile(DrawObjContainer *oc)
01650 {
01651    // Calculate asymmetries for each target position
01652    TH2* hChVsDelim_up   = (TH2*) oc->o["hChVsDelim_up"];
01653    TH2* hChVsDelim_down = (TH2*) oc->o["hChVsDelim_down"];
01654    TH1* hAsymVsDelim4Ch = (TH1*) oc->o["hAsymVsDelim4Ch"];
01655 
01656    if (!hChVsDelim_up || !hChVsDelim_down || !hAsymVsDelim4Ch) {
01657       Error("AsymCalculator::CalcStripAsymmetryByProfile", "No proper histograms available to calculate asymmetry. Skipping...");
01658       return;
01659    }
01660 
01661    for (Int_t iDelim=1; iDelim<=hAsymVsDelim4Ch->GetNbinsX(); iDelim++)
01662    {
01663       TH1I *hUp   = (TH1I*) hChVsDelim_up  ->ProjectionY("hUp",   iDelim, iDelim);
01664       TH1I *hDown = (TH1I*) hChVsDelim_down->ProjectionY("hDown", iDelim, iDelim);
01665 
01666       // Check if there are events in the histograms
01667       if (!hUp->Integral() && !hDown->Integral()) continue;
01668 
01669       TH1D* hChAsym = CalcChannelAsym(*hUp, *hDown);
01670 
01671       TFitResultPtr fitres = FitChAsymSine(*hChAsym);
01672 
01673       if (fitres.Get()) {
01674          Double_t val = fitres->Value(0);
01675          Double_t err = fitres->FitResult::Error(0);
01676 
01677          hAsymVsDelim4Ch->SetBinContent(iDelim, val);
01678          hAsymVsDelim4Ch->SetBinError(iDelim, err);
01679 
01680       } else {
01681          Error("AsymCalculator::CalcStripAsymmetryByProfile", "Fit error in time bin (delim) %d", iDelim);
01682       }
01683 
01684       delete hChAsym;
01685    }
01686 }
01687

01690 void AsymCalculator::CalcKinEnergyAChAsym(DrawObjContainer *oc)
01691 {
01692    TH2 *hChVsKinE_Up      = (TH2*) oc->o["hChVsKinEnergyA_up"];
01693    TH2 *hChVsKinE_Down    = (TH2*) oc->o["hChVsKinEnergyA_down"];
01694    TH1 *hKinEnergyAChAsym = (TH1*) oc->o["hKinEnergyAChAsym"];
01695 
01696    for (Int_t iKinE=1; iKinE<=hKinEnergyAChAsym->GetNbinsX(); iKinE++)
01697    {
01698       TH1I *hUp   = (TH1I*) hChVsKinE_Up  ->ProjectionY("hUp",   iKinE, iKinE);
01699       TH1I *hDown = (TH1I*) hChVsKinE_Down->ProjectionY("hDown", iKinE, iKinE);
01700 
01701       // Check if there are events in the histograms
01702       if (!hUp->Integral() && !hDown->Integral()) continue;
01703 
01704       TH1D* hChAsym = CalcChannelAsym(*hUp, *hDown);
01705 
01706       TFitResultPtr fitres = FitChAsymSine(*hChAsym);
01707 
01708       if (fitres.Get()) {
01709          Double_t val = fitres->Value(0);
01710          Double_t err = fitres->FitResult::Error(0);
01711 
01712          hKinEnergyAChAsym->SetBinContent(iKinE, val);
01713          hKinEnergyAChAsym->SetBinError(iKinE, err);
01714       } else {
01715          Error("AsymCalculator::CalcKinEnergyAChAsym", "Fit error in energy bin %d", iKinE);
01716       }
01717 
01718       delete hChAsym;
01719    }
01720 }
